explains: vt. 登记；使加入；把……记入名册；使入伍
vi. 参加；登记；注册；记入名册

sentences.en: It is not necessary to enroll before the course starts.
sentences.cn: 不需要在课程开始前注册。

sentences.en: Please enroll with the secretary before Friday this week.
sentences.cn: 请在本周五之前到秘书处登记。

sentences.en: So you'll just enroll in a thesis seminar for the second semester.
sentences.cn: 所以你只需要在第二学期报名注册一个论文研讨会就可以了。
